name: Starvesters
description:
Starvesters is an colorful ambient experience that requires you to explore a solar system to harvest lights from planets to reenergize the sun and avoid its extinction.

Controls
  • Z Q S D or W A S D to move around
  • Mouse to rotate
  • K to switch between AZERTY and QWERTY
  • Shift to boost
  • Escape to unlock your mouse
Gameplay

You’re here to harvest the lights generated by the planets to reenergize the sun before its extinction

Be careful, you have to collect only the light that has the same color as your sun

CHANGELOG
  • Fix mouse lock on webGL
